author: veithen
msg: Moved the old Axis 1.x trunk out of the way: after several years of inactivity I don't think it's possible to create a maintenance release with a well defined set of fixes from the old trunk.

author: kwright
msg: Reorganize test base classes for extendibility.  Part of CONNECTORS-346, and may also address issues related to CONNECTORS-341.
